name: Family Game Night
description: HASBRO FAMILY GAME NIGHT is now available on Xbox LIVE! Featuring six downloadable games, including BATTLESHIP, YAHTZEE, BOGGLE, CONNECT FOUR, SORRY!, and the all-new SORRY! Sliders, HASBRO FAMILY GAME NIGHT has something for everyone! Join your host MR. POTATO HEAD for fun and games with family and friends like never before. Enjoy familiar original Hasbro board games or throw in a fun spin with new versions like CONNECT FOUR Power Chips, BOGGLE Portal Cubes, Reverse YAHTZEE, and BATTLESHIP Super Weapons – which add fresh dimensions and challenges to these legendary favorites! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
